title: Town Slimes
summaries: Town Slimes are a type of town pet. There are 8 different Town Slimes; different from the Town Bunny, Town Cat, and the Town Dog, all kinds of Town Slimes can all exist at the same time, with each Slime having different move in conditions.

ImageNameCondition
[img:Nerdy Slime]Nerdy Slime
Internal NPC ID: 670
Will move in after killing King Slime.
[img:Cool Slime]Cool Slime
Internal NPC ID: 678
Can move in when there is a natural active Party.
[img:Elder Slime]Elder Slime
Internal NPC ID: 679
Moves in after unlocking an Old Shaking Chest in the Cavern Layer with a Golden Key.
[img:Clumsy Slime]Clumsy Slime
Internal NPC ID: 680
Can be found floating with a balloon near floating islands in the Space Layer.
[img:Diva Slime]Diva Slime
Internal NPC ID: 681
Moves in after throwing a Sparkle Slime Balloon into Shimmer.
[img:Surly Slime]Surly Slime
Internal NPC ID: 682
Can be fished up during a Blood Moon.
[img:Mystic Slime]Mystic Slime
Internal NPC ID: 683
Moves in after using Purification Powder on a Mystic Frog in the Jungle.
[img:Squire Slime]Squire Slime
Internal NPC ID: 684
Moves in after dropping a Copper Helmet or a Copper Shortsword on a Slime.
